::Ender::
       He glared over his shoulder at Razor Claw.  "Listen.  I just want to 
leave.  I don't care about this stupid faction.  I was hired by Shivah's 
predicesor and I haven't been given anything to do.  I've been given errands 
but every time there's a battle I get ignored.  BATTLES ARE WHAT I PLAN!"

--part1_17.1b6d5e89.28d010b4_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
